channel.title: Help!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew1112 Andrew1112
item.description:
@Andrew1112 wrote:

I am making a party room and i am stuck in one place. I made a dp.cfg and the server loads it. My only problem is that i need to make the random int in misc.java choose random items in dp.cfg instead of item.cfg any1 know how to help me?

This is the random code.

public static int random(int range) { // 0 till range (range INCLUDED) return (int) (java.lang.Math.random() * (range + 1)); }

This is the drop code im using.

for (int x = 2741; x > 2734; x--) { for (int y = 3470; y > 3472; y--) { try { int dpid = misc.random(7000); //This is what i need help on. ItemHandler.addItem(dpid - 1, x, y, 1, playerId, false); Thread.sleep(10); } catch (Exception e) { } } } }

Read full topic
